text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
(Okay~, ready... start!
——One sheep! Two sheep! Three sheep!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
(——100 sheep! 101 sheep!
102 sheep! I'll keep going strong~!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
(——10,000 sheep! 10,001 sheep!
10,002 sheep——It's fine!
I can go even more, I——!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
——Huh? It's bright...
Morning? It's already morning!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
O-oh no, I did it~...!
I tried too hard counting sheep~!

Her means and ends got reversed, and Matikanetannhauser
ended up pulling an all-nighter unintentionally...
